header.title: We transform your idea into a digital experience
header.subtitle: We develop custom websites and applications that boost your business
header.whatsapp_button: Tell us a little about your project

about.heading: About Us
about.text: WhoamiCode is a leading web development company dedicated to creating innovative and user-friendly web solutions. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality results that help businesses thrive in the digital world.

custom_dev.title: Custom Web Development
custom_dev.text: We provide tailored web development solutions designed to meet the specific needs of your business. From high-quality websites to complex platforms, we ensure that every project is unique and functional.

ui_ux.title: UI/UX Design
ui_ux.text: We specialize in designing intuitive user interfaces and exceptional user experiences. We create engaging designs that not only capture attention but also facilitate navigation and maximize conversion.

support.title: Maintenance and Support
support.text: We offer ongoing maintenance and support services to ensure your website or application runs smoothly. We handle updates, bug fixes, and continuous improvements to keep your project in top shape.

step1.title: Step 1: Discovery
step1.text: We start by understanding your business needs and goals. During this phase, we conduct research, gather requirements, and identify key project objectives to ensure a clear and aligned vision.

step2.title: Step 2: Design and Prototyping
step2.text: Our team creates wireframes and prototypes to visualize the project's design and functionality. We work closely with you to refine the design, ensuring it meets your expectations and provides an excellent user experience.

step3.title: Step 3: Development
step3.text: In this phase, we bring the design to life by developing the website or application. Our development process includes coding, integrating necessary features, and ensuring that everything functions as intended.

step4.title: Step 4: Launch and Support
step4.text: Once development is complete, we prepare for the launch. We handle the deployment process and provide ongoing support to address any issues that arise and make any necessary improvements.

contact.heading: Tell us a little about your project
contact.text: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us by filling out the form below. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.about: WhoamiCode is a leading web development company dedicated to creating innovative and user-friendly web solutions. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality results that help businesses thrive in the digital world.
